main_introduction: This section is a lesson in il8n.  Showing the correct laungage based of browser locale
main_render_with_mock: Render pages with mock data. This makes it easy to build and review page states without needing to navigate to them in your app. Here are some handy patterns for managing page data in Storybook:
main_render_higher_level: Use a higher-level connected component. Storybook helps you compose such data from the "args" of child component stories
main_render_assemble_data: Assemble data in the page component from your services. You can mock these services out using Storybook.
login_form_email_password: Provide your email and password to login to this website please
